snippet.title: Hermit and Pig - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs The Game Awards Edition 2023
snippet.description:
Hermit and Pig is a story-rich RPG adventure developed by Heavy Lunch Studio LLC. Players will embody both an introverted man named Hermit and a mighty pig to explore, fight, and reveal the truth behind a corrupt corporate plot. Deciding what attack works best for the enemy at hand is key to the battle system and promotes a more creative angle to combat as opposed to a traditional way. Hermit and Pig is coming to PC in 2024.

#DayOfTheDevs #HermitAndPig
